title: "EEOC Joins the List of Executive Branch Agencies Launching Initiatives on Artificial Intelligence"
excerpt: "Chair Charlotte Burrows announced that the EEOC is launching an initiative to ensure that artificial intelligence (AI) and other emerging tools used in hiring and other employment decisions comply with federal civil rights laws that the EEOC enforces."
